pr_title: DHFPROD-4843: Display service name in header, system-info dialog

timeline.bodyText: I expect to rename this to SystemInfo in a future JIRA ticket as well, didn't want to increase the blast radius of this PR though. Also note that "clusterName" is appropriate here because this is a DHF class, and it doesn't know specifically about DHS, which is where the concept of "serviceName" exists.
timeline.author: rjrudin

timeline.message:
DHFPROD-4843: Display service name in header, dialog

- Refactor project-page component, use new /api/environment/systemInfo endpoint.
- Rename ProjectPage component to SystemInfo
- Move SystemInfo component with Header component since only Header calls SystemInfo
- Refactor mocked user-context data and associated types.
- Fix some typing issues in test mocks.
- Test for service name in: header.test, system-info.test
- /api/environment/project-info is now /api/environment/systemInfo.
- Removing /api/info - sessionTimeout is now part of systemInfo.
- No longer including projectName in the authentication response either, to avoid redundancy.

Thinking that SystemService.getVersions should be renamed to SystemService.getSystemInfo too, but will tackle that later in a separate PR to minimize the amount of changes here.

DHFPROD-4843: Update Cypress custom command to use the new endpoint
